approve(address,address,uint256).details: In general, the only way to transfer funds out of this contract is through a call to this function and a subsequent call to `transferFrom`. This approval is expected to work similarly to an ERC-20 approval (in particular, the allowance doesn't reset once the call is terminated).

params.amount: The amount of tokens to set as the allowance.
params.target: The address that will be allowed to spend the token.
params.token: The token to approve for transferring.

params._router: The router supported by this contract.

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.details: Ensure that the contract can return the debt + premium, e.g., has      enough funds to repay and has approved the Pool to pull the total amount

params.amounts: The amounts of the flash-borrowed assets
params.assets: The addresses of the flash-borrowed assets
params.initiator: The address of the flashloan initiator
params.params: The byte-encoded params passed when initiating the flashloan
params.premiums: The fee of each flash-borrowed asset

returns._0: True if the execution of the operation succeeds, false otherwise

params.amount: The amount of funds requested from the lender.
params.callBackData: The data to send back when calling the router once the loan is received.
params.lender: The address of the flash-loan lender from which to borrow.
params.token: The token that is requested in the flash loan.

approve(address,address,uint256).notice: Approves the target address to spend the specified token on behalf of the Borrower up to the specified amount.

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: Executes an operation after receiving the flash-borrowed assets

flashLoanAndCallBack(address,address,uin.notice: Requests a flash loan with the specified parameters from the lender and, once the funds have been received, call back the router while passing through the specified custom data. The flash-loan repayment is expected to take place during the final settlement in the router.

router().notice: The router contract that manages this borrower contract. It will be called back once the flash-loan proceeds are received and is the only address that can trigger a flash loan request.

settlementContract().notice: The settlement contract supported by this contract.
